title: Riot, please respond to the dislike for PROJECT: FIORA's model hair
body:
It's easy to find, there is one above.

The hair isn't Fiora enough even for a futuristic robotic or futuristic special trained assassin version of Fiora. Needs the Emo-Curve. Needs the streak. Please, Riot. 

I went to the betaboards and noticed hundreds of people telling you about that awful hair, and not one Riot response said anything about it.

Very Respectfully,

Tricit

PS: no, she is not a Super Saiyan. Fix it asap.

replies.body: Riot plz respond to the **like** for PROJECT Fiora's hair.

Hey Tricit,

I was QA on PROJECT: Fiora, so I can shed a bit of light on the hair debate for this skin.

I collected a bunch of feedback regarding Fiora, including thoughts on her hair. I took feedback from several platforms including boards (these boards and PBE), Reddit comments, and YouTube comments.

The result? It was about 50/50. 

Some players really liked the hair because it fit in with the thematic of PROJECT:, or they liked that her hair was different in this skin as compared to her other skins. Other players wanted hair hair down, similar to how she has it in her other skins. 

Based on the feedback, we made the call to keep the hair the way it currently is. We agree that the pushed back white hair is more cohesive with the PROJECT: thematic. This is the hair that you'll see on PROJECT: Fiora once she goes live, there will be no additional changes made.
